title: I do some ablation experiments!
body:
Sorry to bother you again!!!

I do some ablation experiments for this paper. But I found some strange results.

Firstly, I run your original code for GTA5->Cityscapes. I got the following result:
![sea](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47933628/96668093-03342e80-138d-11eb-8118-68d5ab49a1f1.png)

Then, I remove your attention mechanism. 
![se2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47933628/96668594-1f849b00-138e-11eb-90b6-b169dae4452e.png)
I got the following results:
![se](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47933628/96668493-de8c8680-138d-11eb-9d18-cfb2d23c91e4.png)

Finally, after remove your attention mechanism, I remove your self-ensembling method.
![Net2](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47933628/96668834-9883f280-138e-11eb-9b49-b5fa08cb81eb.png)
I got the following results:
![Net](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/47933628/96668868-a9346880-138e-11eb-8f4c-b8a3f56b8ea3.png)

So I'm very confused about this. Can you give me some advice and opinion on this? Thanks so much!!!
